conbody.p: The aim of this widget is to design auto-complete drop-down list output. By using this widget, you can specify an item's content for this drop-down list. One item has a title and a maximum of three lines. Each line can display a maximum of three attributes.
conbody.note: This widget appears in the palette only inside modules of type auto-complete.
conbody.p: The following image shows an example of this widget:
